first_step_towards: Take the first step towards growing your business!
your_switch_profile_setup_is_complete: Congratulations! Your Switch Profile setup is complete. We'll reach out to you for any additional verification, if needed
thank_you_for_submitting_loan:
Thank you for submitting your application!

Our team will review your application and follow up with you shortly for any further questions! We may request additional documents as required as part of our review process!
you_sure_you_want_exit: Are you sure you want to exit?
exiting_the_application: Exiting the application form will delete the progress made on the form. Do you wish to continue?
information_accurately: Please ensure you have entered all your information accurately before submitting the application.
customer_and_need_to_edit: Customer And Need To Edit, Add, Or Update Your Personal And Business Information, Please Fill Out Below Form.
submitting_your_application: By submitting your application, you acknowledge and agree to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information as outlined below, including for marketing purposes. Read further in our T&Cs.
data_security_access:
Data Security, Access, and Marketing Consent:
We are committed to safeguarding your information with security measures in place. You have the right to withdraw consent, request access or correction of your data, and opt-out of marketing communications at any time. However, withdrawal of consent may affect the processing of your application.
data_usage_and_disclosure:
Data Usage and Disclosure:
We will use your information for verification, credit evaluation, communication, compliance with legal requirements, and for marketing our products and services. Your data may be disclosed to internal staff, credit bureaus, regulatory authorities, and third-party marketing partners on a need-to-know basis.
please_read_this_consent_clause: Please read this consent clause carefully before proceeding with your application:
purpose_of_data_collection:
Purpose of Data Collection:
Your personal information is collected for evaluating your eligibility for the requested lending product, assessing creditworthiness, facilitating the lending process, and for marketing purposes as described below.
